channel.title: 718/728 ProIonic
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/banner.png[/img] *Looking For Experienced Staff*
Website: [URL=http://proionic.forumotion.ca]Click Here.[/URL] Webclient:[URL=http://proionic.forumotion.ca/h2-webclient]Click Here.[/URL] Downloadable Client: [URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/d5axss4e6a2u1b5/ProIonic.jar?dl=1]Click Here.[/URL]
[size=14pt]ProIonic is an epic pvp and also skill based server with an economy, we are now open from beta and welcome you to join the astonishing server ProIonic718. [/size]
[size=12pt]Updates: Added farming 100% Added squeal of fortune 100% Added slayer 100% Added summoning 100% Added sof tickets to shops for 5m Finished adding correct donator crowns both normal and extreme donators Added dungeoneering 100%-Smithing/Smelting su and teleport to dung with this command ::dung Finished donator zone[/size]
[size=24pt]Features[/size] ------------ [color=blue]- Working NEX - DICING - Barrows - Jad - DominionTower - Corp Beast with dark core! - Online 24/7 with efficient updates - 100% Uptime - No lag - Money pouch - 100% trading - Queen Black Dragon - 63 wave Fight Caves - 100% Fight Pits Minigame - WORKING SUMMONING-** - WORKING CONSTRUCTION-** - 100%WORKING SKILLS-** - Dominion Tower with rewards - Corporeal Beast - XP lamps - Perfect switching - Fully working curses,ancients,lunar and gfx. - quick and fun leveling - Economy - News announcements - boss kills, levels, and more! - Hours of fun - Dedicated staff team and developers that provide great player support - Active forums 24/7 - dicing - Summoning with working scrolls - Donator pets - epic pvp and pvm - Fully working MiniGames - Korasi and other weapons with proper special attack - dungeoneering floor with working boss! - Loads of shops - Working Skills[/SIZE][/COLOR] -------------------------------- Disclaimer: As this is beta there still will be a lot of work that needs to be done and bugs that need to be fixed, so if you do find a bug please report it other wise don't abuse them thx :)
[color=purple]Media[/color]
[IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/javaw2012-12-3105-59-59-17_zpsc5ab52b2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/javaw2012-12-3105-59-37-16_zps385327d4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/javaw2012-12-3104-23-01-95_zps49b6bcb5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/Untitled2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/Untitled.png[/img] [IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/4f4f4f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/Untitled22.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/gg.png[/img]

item.title: 718/728 ProIonic
item.dc:creator: @tonyg2 tonyg2
item.description:
@tonyg2 wrote:

[quote=“thakillah, post:11, topic:467322”]Thanks

if somebody dl a matrix source change some coords spawns some npc and get this
dude I have been coding for months with matrix. I know what you changed or not
if you started on custom thing or quests and stuff it could be better[/quote]
Fixed more shop/item bugs and also will be working on slayer tonight.
also what if this is not a matrix? from what i hear people are getting key logged with matrix so i don’t consider matrix sources safe and would choice not to use matrix by any chance.

Read full topic

item.title: 718/728 ProIonic
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Rocket_Power, post:10, topic:467322”]Jc22493: The last time I checked, opinions were not forbidden in this particular section. As for “he can host whatever he wants” that is true, we aren’t saying he can’t. Thakillah simply stated his opinion (which he has a right to do so) and that should’ve been the end of it.

As for TR’s comments, he is correct. He has been a member of this community longer than Tony and knows how others can get. He was attempting to assist him better his ways.

On Point: looks no different from the others.[/quote]

item.title: 718/728 ProIonic
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:18, topic:467323”][quote author=tonyg2 link=topic=584258.msg4159766#msg4159766 date=1352947075]
please don’t tell me how to make my thread, and its funny that u always come back to troll or comment on my thread get a life
[/quote]

I’m trying to help you out, but obviously you’re too stubborn or ignorant to listen to someone who knows more than you.[/quote]
You’re not trying to help, you were and are obviously derailing the advertisement thread. He doesn’t need your crap here, so if you insist on spamming his thread with ‘listen to someone who knows more than you’, you may leave.

[quote=“thakillah, post:25, topic:467323”]It’s a leech

and it’s not spam we are giving our honest opinion[/quote]
It doesn’t matter what your ‘honest opinion’ is. This is an advertisement thread, not a release. He can host whatever he wants, I don’t see what the matter is. Your ‘honest opinion’ was merely fueled by others also jumping on the flamewagon.

@topic: I’ve cleaned up the thread and the next person who spams will receive an infraction.

Read full topic

item.title: 718/728 ProIonic
item.dc:creator: @tonyg2 tonyg2
item.description:
@tonyg2 wrote:


Looking For Experienced Staff

Website: Click Here.
Webclient:Click Here.
Downloadable Client: Click Here.

[size=14pt]ProIonic is an epic pvp and also skill based server with an economy,
we are now open from beta and welcome you to join the astonishing server ProIonic718. [/size]

[size=12pt]Updates:
Added farming 100%
Added squeal of fortune 100%
Added slayer 100%
Added summoning 100%
Added sof tickets to shops for 5m
Finished adding correct donator crowns both normal and extreme donators
Added dungeoneering 100%-Smithing/Smelting su and teleport to dung with this command ::dung
Finished donator zone[/size]

[size=24pt]Features[/size]

[color=blue]- Working NEX

  • DICING
  • Barrows
  • Jad
  • DominionTower
  • Corp Beast with dark core!
  • Online 24/7 with efficient updates
  • 100% Uptime
  • No lag
  • Money pouch
  • 100% trading
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • 63 wave Fight Caves
  • 100% Fight Pits Minigame
  • WORKING SUMMONING-**
  • WORKING CONSTRUCTION-**
  • 100%WORKING SKILLS-**
  • Dominion Tower with rewards
  • Corporeal Beast
  • XP lamps
  • Perfect switching
  • Fully working curses,ancients,lunar and gfx.
  • quick and fun leveling
  • Economy
  • News announcements - boss kills, levels, and more!
  • Hours of fun
  • Dedicated staff team and developers that provide great player support
  • Active forums 24/7
  • dicing
  • Summoning with working scrolls
  • Donator pets
  • epic pvp and pvm
  • Fully working MiniGames
  • Korasi and other weapons with proper special attack
  • dungeoneering floor with working boss!
  • Loads of shops
  • Working Skills[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Disclaimer:
As this is beta there still will be a lot of work that needs to be done
and bugs that need to be fixed, so if you do find a bug please report it other wise don’t abuse them thx
